name: Not Responding
description:
This is a game I made for school, my first clicker game, and one of my first games in Makecode.
You take the role of a board student playing coolmathgames when the browser freezes, but you wont let a browser tell you what to do. Get the browser running or kill your chromebook trying.
Controls:
A - Click
D-Pad/WASD - Move Cursor
